name: 10 Seconds of Chaos
description:
Stuck in a strange reality, a man must collect obs and count down the seconds as he runs from hill to hill dodging the toxic fluids that come and go as time goes on, hoping to open the gate and get back home.

All Audio came from FreeSound.org. 

All Animations came from Mixamo. 

The font came from DaFont.

A Ludum Dare 51 Jam Submission every 10 Seconds.
